mapper.sql: select sc.sc_id, sc.student_id, sc.open_id, sc.score, sc.usual_score, sc.exam_score, sc.enroll_time, sc.status, sc.is_evaluated, sc.create_by, sc.create_time, sc.update_by, sc.update_time, sc.remark, su.student_id as student_no, su.nick_name as student_name, c.course_code, c.course_name, c.credit, t.term_id, t.term_name, o.status as course_status, o.class_time, o.class_location, tu.nick_name as teacher_name from edu_student_course sc left join edu_student s on sc.student_id = s.student_id left join sys_user su on s.user_id = su.user_id left join edu_course_opening o on sc.open_id = o.open_id left join edu_course c on o.course_id = c.course_id left join edu_term t on o.term_id = t.term_id left join edu_teacher et on o.teacher_id = et.teacher_id left join sys_user tu on et.user_id = tu.user_id
mapper.select: where sc.student_id = #{studentId} and sc.status = '0' order by sc.enroll_time desc
where sc.student_id = #{studentId} and sc.open_id = #{openId} and sc.status = '0'
mapper.insert:

student_id, open_id, score, usual_score, exam_score, enroll_time, status, create_by, remark, create_time

mapper.update: update edu_student_course set status = '1', update_time = sysdate() where student_id = #{studentId} and open_id = #{openId} and status = '0'

mapper.select: select sc.sc_id as scId, sc.open_id as openId, sc.student_id as studentId, c.course_name as courseName, tu.nick_name as teacherName, t.term_name as termName, sc.score as overallScore from edu_student_course sc left join edu_course_opening o on sc.open_id = o.open_id left join edu_course c on o.course_id = c.course_id left join edu_term t on o.term_id = t.term_id left join sys_user tu on o.teacher_id = tu.user_id where sc.student_id = #{studentId} and sc.status = '0' and o.status = '1' and (sc.is_evaluated is null or sc.is_evaluated = '0') order by t.term_id desc

select COUNT(*) as courseCount, SUM(CAST(c.credit AS DECIMAL(5,2))) as totalCredit, SUM(CAST(c.credit AS DECIMAL(5,2)) * CASE WHEN sc.score >= 90 THEN 4.0 WHEN sc.score >= 85 THEN 3.7 WHEN sc.score >= 82 THEN 3.3 WHEN sc.score >= 78 THEN 3.0 WHEN sc.score >= 75 THEN 2.7 WHEN sc.score >= 72 THEN 2.3 WHEN sc.score >= 68 THEN 2.0 WHEN sc.score >= 64 THEN 1.5 WHEN sc.score >= 60 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0 END) as weightedGpa, SUM(CASE WHEN sc.score >= 60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as passCount, SUM(CASE WHEN sc.score < 60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as failCount from edu_student_course sc left join edu_course_opening o on sc.open_id = o.open_id left join edu_course c on o.course_id = c.course_id where sc.student_id = #{studentId} and sc.score is not null
and o.term_id = #{termId}

select t.term_id as termId, t.term_name as termName, COUNT(*) as courseCount, SUM(CAST(c.credit AS DECIMAL(5,2))) as totalCredit, ROUND(SUM(CAST(c.credit AS DECIMAL(5,2)) * CASE WHEN sc.score >= 90 THEN 4.0 WHEN sc.score >= 85 THEN 3.7 WHEN sc.score >= 82 THEN 3.3 WHEN sc.score >= 78 THEN 3.0 WHEN sc.score >= 75 THEN 2.7 WHEN sc.score >= 72 THEN 2.3 WHEN sc.score >= 68 THEN 2.0 WHEN sc.score >= 64 THEN 1.5 WHEN sc.score >= 60 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0 END) / SUM(CAST(c.credit AS DECIMAL(5,2))), 2) as gpa, SUM(CASE WHEN sc.score >= 60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as passCount, SUM(CASE WHEN sc.score < 60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as failCount from edu_student_course sc left join edu_course_opening o on sc.open_id = o.open_id left join edu_course c on o.course_id = c.course_id left join edu_term t on o.term_id = t.term_id where sc.student_id = #{studentId} and sc.score is not null group by t.term_id, t.term_name order by t.term_id desc
